page.title: 12INTERVIEW WITH Mr.CAVE
page.content: {1)}How long have you lived in this area ? {2)}Have you farmed since leaving school? {3)}What acreage do you farm? {4)}What crops do you grow? {5)}Have you any employees if so how many? {6)}Have you any interest in organic farming? {7)}Do you use chemical fertilisers weed killers etc.? {8)}Do your workers live locally? {9)}Have you any connection with 'Fourfields' school? {10)}Do you enjoy this contact? {11)}Any other comments? -------------------------------------- 1){37 years }5){6 }9){Governor 2){yes }6){yes }10){yes 3){63 years }7){yes }11){no 4){bulbs grain,potatoes peas}8){5
